main.title: Create your perfect README in minutes
main.preTitle: Upload your GitHub repository or ZIP archive and we will automatically generate a professional README file with a full analysis of the project structure.

zipContainer.dragPreTitle: or click to select a file
zipContainer.textBottom: Only ZIP archives are supported. Maximum size: 50MB
